name: categorical_gold_v12
title: Gold Deposits
description: Categorical layer where cells are defined as lootable, surface, or non-lootable gold deposits (or mix). Derived from GOLDATA dataset which consists of 2969 entries for gold occurrences in 108 countries.

extract_types_info.categorical: Gold deposit type. Note: 'mix' is an additional category for cells that contain more than one deposit type.
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Balestri Sara & Mario A. Maggioni, 2014. ‘Blood diamonds, dirty gold and spatial spill-overs: Measuring conflict dynamics in Western Africa’, in Peace Economics, Peace science and Public Policy, Vol. 20 (4): 551-564.
